alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Essex (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:58PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Caledonia and central Essex Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Haven, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, Bloomfield, East Haven, Ferdinand, Granby, Maidstone, Maidstone State Park, Victory, Newark, Guildhall, Burke, Lemington, Brighton, Gallup Mills, and Brunswick Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
